packs.name: FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.20
packs.synopsis: Join Direwolf20 for an immersive Minecraft journey in the all-new 1.20 version of the FTB and Direwolf20 collaboration!

packs.name: FTB Presents AbePack
packs.synopsis: Shenanagins is happening and it's Abe's Fault! FTB has teamed up with twitch.tv/abe and other streamers to create a fun new adventure pack focused on a long play modded experience with friends. Grab your pickaxes and hop in!

packs.name: FTB Unstable 1.20: Forge
packs.synopsis: Experience the cutting-edge of Modded Minecraft in Unstable 1.20!! Forge Edition!

packs.name: FTB Unstable 1.20: Fabric
packs.synopsis: Experience the cutting-edge of Modded Minecraft in Unstable 1.20! Fabric Edition!

packs.name: FTB University 1.19
packs.synopsis: An educational introduction to the world of complex modded systems now on Minecraft version 1.19.2!

packs.name: FTB Presents Integration by Parts DX
packs.synopsis: Unleash your creativity with Integration by Parts DX; a non-traditional expert pack where innovation meets endless possibilities.

packs.name: FTB Skies
packs.synopsis: FTB Skies is an immersive modpack that challenges you to survive, build and conquer obstacles on a unique floating island. With a perfect blend of magic and technology, quests, and custom events, the experience is unforgettable.

packs.name: FTB Legend of the Eyes
packs.synopsis: Twelve eyes, scattered around the world. When brought together, they create a portal to unspeakable danger and adventure.

packs.name: FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.19
packs.synopsis: FTB and Direwolf have a new and thrilling escapade in store for you! Since 2011, FTB and Direwolf20 have provided simple-yet-unique kitchen-sink-type modpacks suitable for every skill level. Now, 1.19 is here and it's better than ever!

packs.name: FTB StoneBlock 3
packs.synopsis: In a world surrounded by stone, build yourself a subterranean kingdom that really rocks! Use magic and technology to forge your realm to your designs.

packs.name: FTB Inferno
packs.synopsis: A rite gone wrong, trapped in a dimension of fire and torment. Your only choice is to bend this world to your will... or be lost to the INFERNO

packs.name: FTB One
packs.synopsis: Our fastest ever produced modpack, unique jigsaw-based world gen, from dungeons to hidden ore clusters. All on a new era of Minecraft, 1.19.

packs.name: FTB Plexiglass Mountain
packs.synopsis: Plexiglass Mountain is a new freeplay kitchen-sink modpack by the FTB Team. With an optional quest-line, a vast variety of mods and unique custom structures generating throughout the world.

packs.name: FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.18
packs.synopsis: Play along with the Direwolf20 as he starts a brand new series on his YouTube channel or join friends on a server and choose your own route.

packs.name: FTB Chocolate
packs.synopsis: A wonderful start to something rich with vanilla styled content, and vastly new terrain generation.

packs.name: FTB Ultimate: Anniversary Edition
packs.synopsis: The anniversary edition of our FTB Ultimate modpack

packs.name: FTB OceanBlock
packs.synopsis: Time to dive in!

packs.name: FTB University 1.16
packs.synopsis: A modpack for learning advanced mods, now for 1.16!

packs.synopsis: A modpack for beginners

packs.name: FTB Cotton
packs.synopsis: Lightweight 1.16.5 fabric modpack

packs.name: FTB Endeavour

packs.name: FTB Presents Direwolf20 1.16
packs.synopsis: Play along with the Direwolf20 as he starts a brand new series on his YouTube channel or join friends on a server and choose your own route.

packs.name: FTB Mage Quest
packs.synopsis: A 1.7.10 magic-focused modpack that invites users to explore the arcane world of magic.  Delve deep into mythical spells,  forbidden knowledge, and a world full of secrets and wonder.

packs.name: YogCraft Modpack
packs.synopsis: The YogCraft pack used for the server in 1.4.7!

packs.name: FTB Ultimate
packs.synopsis: The original jumbo FTB package created to provide the ultimate Minecraft adventure. This monster of a 1.4.7 pack has something for everyone: magic, technology, exploration, and everything in-between.

packs.name: FTB Tech World
packs.synopsis: A collection of the best technical mods Minecraft has to offer

packs.name: MindCrack Pack
packs.synopsis: Play along with the MindCrack members on their various YouTube and Twitch series with this customized 1.4.7 pack.

packs.name: Magic World
packs.synopsis: A 1.4.7 magic-themed pack. Experience all the mythical and magical mods that 1.4.7 Minecraft has to offer.

packs.synopsis: A lightweight, simple-to-use 1.6.4 modpack designed for both users who are either unfamiliar with  mods or those with computers unable to withstand larger packs.

packs.synopsis: Play along with Direwolf20 in this FTB pack curated and designed to match his 1.4.7 YouTube series.

packs.synopsis: Let the monster rise! This large all-encompassing 1.6.4

packs.name: FTB Builders Paradise
packs.synopsis: In stark contrast to the tech heavy, goal orientated skyblock packs of late, FTB is proud to bring you BUILDERS PARADISE, a pack that celebrates the beauty and majesty of modded Minecraft.

packs.name: FTB Ultimate Reloaded
packs.synopsis: FTB Ultimate Reloaded is one of our lighter 1.12.2 modpacks based around the original Ultimate that was released on Minecraft 1.4.7 over 5 years ago.

packs.name: FTB Revelation
packs.synopsis: Revelation is a general all-purpose modpack with optimal FPS, server performance and stability.

packs.name: FTB Continuum
packs.synopsis: FTB Continuum is an expert style modpack packed with some of the latest tech mods by Feed the Beast!

packs.name: FTB Sky Adventures
packs.synopsis: FTB Sky Adventures is a large 1.12 modpack with a mix of tech and magic mods using a new questing system, FTB Quests.

packs.name: FTB Pyramid Reborn 3.0
packs.synopsis: Six years after the original FTB pyramid map was released the FTB team returns with a whole new set of challenges for Minecraft 1.12.

packs.synopsis: Play along with Direwolf20 in this FTB pack curated and designed to match his 1.12.2 YouTube series.
